content.description: Everett Collection Historical / Alamy Stock Photo
content.question: The depiction in the photograph best provides evidence for which of the following developments in the late 1940s and early 1950s?

choices.label: The spread of mass culture to many Americans
The influence of the Sun Belt on national politics
The fear of communist infiltration of the United States
The use of media to change the course of the Cold War

content.answer: The spread of mass culture to many Americans

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
